meanings.definition: Inclined to confabulate or engage in conversation
meanings.sent1: She is a confabulatory person, always eager to chat with others.
meanings.sent2: The confabulatory group discussed various topics during their meeting.
meanings.sent3: The confabulatory squirrel chattered away to its fellow woodland creatures.
meanings.sent4: Her confabulatory nature made her the life of the party.
meanings.sent5: The confabulatory atmosphere in the room was filled with laughter and stories.

meanings.sent1: The confabulatory study focused on the phenomenon of memory errors.
meanings.sent2: The researcher presented his confabulatory findings at the conference.
meanings.sent3: The confabulatory theories proposed by the scientist sparked a lively debate.
meanings.sent4: Her confabulatory explanation shed light on the mysterious phenomenon.
meanings.sent5: The confabulatory nature of the research raised intriguing questions.

meanings.definition: Tending to fabricate imaginary experiences or events
meanings.sent1: The child's confabulatory stories entertained his friends for hours.
meanings.sent2: Her confabulatory imagination led to creative storytelling.
meanings.sent3: The confabulatory tales spun by the author captivated readers worldwide.
meanings.sent4: His confabulatory mind conjured up fantastical worlds beyond imagination.
meanings.sent5: The confabulatory dreams of the protagonist became a best-selling novel.
